title: What is the best rock romantic song? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you're thinking of rock love song.. then it can't be one perticular song. Dude, it's flooding songs inside my brain. I list down some of them.. i m listening recently Shinedown - I'll follow you, The Crow and The Butterfly, Missfits Rev Theory - Say Goodbye, The Fire, Broken Bones Seether - Broken Papa Roach - No Matt What (i like Acoustic version more), Scars, Forever, Before I Die, Never Should've Met Me, Gravity Pop Evil - Monster You Made, Broken and Betrayed, Silence and Scars, Torn to Pieces Machine Gun Kelly - Her Song The Script - The Man Who Can't be Moved, Breakeven, For the first time, Six Degree of separation, Nothing, No Words, Millionaire Avenged Sevenfold - Dear God, Sieze the Day… sorry I can't type long in mobile .. there is just no stopping
